level.heading: Board of Parole - Created; members; procedural rules; transfer of powers, employees, supplies and appropriations of Board of Indeterminate Sentence and Parole; duties of Parole Executive; cooperation of Department of Corrections.
Legislative History of Law 7-103
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-103, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 24-401.01.
